description:
Butch Cassidy is the leader of the Wild Bunch gang. He, along with http://anidb.net/ch83936 [Sundance Kid], was transported from Bolivia, and is now fighting against the http://anidb.net/ch81510 [Black King] and his armies. Unlike his partner, Butch has a more wild personality. He favors the use of firearms, particularly a pair of pistols, in battle.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Butch Cassidy
